name: Taken Armaments
description:
Defeating a Taken combatant with a grenade grants Heavy ammo.

This mod's abilities cannot stack across multiple copies.

name: Taken Invigoration
description:
Defeating a challenging Taken combatant refreshes your class ability.

This mod's abilities cannot stack across multiple copies.

name: Taken Barrier
description: Receiving Taken damage gives a 20% reduction in damage for 10 seconds.

name: Taken Repurposing
description: Destroying a Taken shield refreshes your grenade ability.

name: Prime Attunement
description: Chance to receive a powerful Prime Engram by defeating challenging enemies or completing Crucible matches.

name: Pure Matterglass Lens
description: Precision kills have a chance to drop weapon telemetries.

name: Finest Matterweave
description:
Defeated bosses have a chance of dropping an Enhancement Core.

Effect lasts until an Enhancement Core is found. Only one Finest Matterweave can be active at a time.

name: Rainmaker
description: Precision final blows have a chance to create a shower of Glimmer.

name: Tangled Shore Experience Log
description: Gain 10% more XP while on the Tangled Shore.

name: Dreaming City Experience Log
description: Gain 10% more XP while in the Dreaming City.

name: Gambit Experience Log
description: Gain 10% more XP while in Gambit.

name: Tangled Shore Glimmer Scavenger
description: Increase Glimmer gains by 10% on the Tangled Shore.

name: Dreaming City Glimmer Scavenger
description: Increase Glimmer gains by 10% in the Dreaming City.

name: Gambit Glimmer Scavenger
description: Increase Glimmer gains by 10% in Gambit.

name: Tangled Shore Scanner
description: Chance to obtain additional resources in the Tangled Shore.

name: Dreaming City Scanner
description: Chance to obtain additional resources in the Dreaming City.

name: Tangled Shore Resource Detector
description: Detect resources within a 30-meter range while on the Tangled Shore.

name: Dreaming City Resource Detector
description: Detect resources within a 30-meter range while in the Dreaming City.

name: Tangled Shore Cache Detector
description: Detect caches within a 30-meter range while on the Tangled Shore.

name: Improved Tangled Shore Cache Detector
description: Detect caches within a 40-meter range while on the Tangled Shore.

name: Dreaming City Cache Detector
description: Detect caches within a 30-meter range while in the Dreaming City.

name: Improved Dreaming City Cache Detector
description: Detect caches within a 40-meter range while in the Dreaming City.

name: Tangled Shore Combo Detector
description: Detect caches or resources within a 30-meter range while on the Tangled Shore.

name: Dreaming City Combo Detector
description: Detect caches or resources within a 30-meter range while in the Dreaming City.

name: Destabilizers
description: [Brake]  : Use while airborne to release roll stabilizers, and move [Movement] to roll.

name: Taegeuk Form
description: Adds a Taegeuk to your transmat effects.

name: Corrupt Ether
description: Adds a corrupted Ether appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Reef Awoken
description: Adds an Awoken teleportation appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Reef Shimmer
description: Adds an Awoken pointillistic appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Reef Oracle
description: Adds an Awoken circle appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Heavy Burst
description: Fires a hard-hitting, two-round burst.

name: Aggressive Burst
description: Hard-hitting two-burst fire.

name: Aggressive Burst
description: Hard-hitting four-burst fire.

name: Aggressive Frame
description: Increases rate of fire after kill.

name: Explosive Shadow
description: Combusts combatants with explosive slugs. Strong against  [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

name: Big Boom
description: Defeating an enemy with Explosive Shadow causes a final explosion.

name: Ahamkara's Eye
description: Unleashes a beam of destruction.

name: Unforeseen Repercussions
description: This weapon's beam superheats its targets upon impact, causing delayed explosions.

name: Four-Headed Dog
description: Shoots from all four barrels.

name: Memento Mori
description: Grants radar while aiming down sights. Bonus damage after kill-reload.

name: Crow's Wings
description: [Heavy Attack]  : Fire a projectile.

name: Precision Slug
description: Single-slug precision round.

name: The Roadborn
description: Precision kills briefly grant bonus handling, range, and precision damage with this weapon.

name: The Survivor
description: Three rapid precision kills while the Roadborn is active will return two rounds to the chamber.

name: Spread Shot Package
description: Aiming this weapon reduces the spread of its projectiles.

name: Taken Predator
description: Bonus damage against Taken enemies and Gambit invaders.

name: Wire Rifle
description: Fires a long-range blinding bolt.

name: Wire Rifle
description: Fires a long-range blinding bolt.

name: Harmonic Laser
description: Power levels fluctuate over time.

name: Supercharged Battery
description: Collecting an Orb of Power grants a period of maximum power that starts with an automatic reload. Sustained fire in this mode suppresses targets.

name: Lightning Rod
description: Precision kills grant the next shot chain-lightning capabilities.

name: Split Electron
description: Fires an arrow that splits when released.

name: Shrapnel Launcher
description: Powerful short-range Solar burst.

name: Release the Wolves
description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : Greatly increases rate of fire and shoots in full auto.

name: Tracking Module
description: Adds tracking capability to rockets. Locks onto targets when aiming down sights.

name: Tracking Module
description: Adds tracking capability to rockets. Locks onto targets when aiming down sights. Increases blast radius.

name: Taken Spec
description: Increased damage against Taken enemies.

name: Explosive Head
description: Arrows explode after a short delay.

name: Explosive Head
description: Arrows explode after a short delay. Increases accuracy.

name: Broadhead
description: Piercing arrowhead that damages the target on entry and exit. One shot can overpenetrate multiple targets.

name: Queen's Wrath
description: When aiming down sights and fully drawn, gain Truesight. Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

name: Precision Frame
description: Compound. Optimized for damage.

name: Lightweight Frame
description: Recurve. Charge quick, move fast.

name: Archer's Tempo
description: Draw time decreases after every precision hit.

name: Archer's Tempo
description: Draw time substantially decreases after every precision hit for a longer duration.

name: Twintails
description: Double tracking rockets, Void and Solar.

name: Play with Your Prey
description: The Void rocket suppresses enemies. The Solar rocket causes damage over time.

name: Sneak Bow
description: Increases hold time and reload speed, and prevents radar pings from shooting while crouched.

name: Sneak Bow
description: Increases hold time and reload speed; prevents radar pings from shooting while crouched. Improves stability and reload.

name: Firefly
description: Precision kills with this weapon increase reload speed and cause the target to explode, dealing Solar damage to nearby enemies.

name: Magnificent Howl
description: Rapidly landing two precision shots increases the next shot's damage and range for a short duration.

name: High Noon
description: Readying this weapon grants a brief period of bonus precision damage.

name: Fourth Time's the Charm
description: Rapidly landing precision hits will return two rounds to the magazine.

name: Fourth Time's the Charm
description: Rapidly landing precision hits will return two rounds to the magazine. Increases time between precision shots.

name: Icarus Grip
description: Moderately increases airborne effectiveness.

name: Freehand Grip
description: Increases accuracy and ready speed while firing from the hip.

name: Boss Spec
description: Increases damage against bosses and vehicles.

name: Counterbalance Stock
description: Reduces recoil deviation for the weapon.

name: Major Spec
description: Deals extra damage against powerful enemies.

name: Minor Spec
description: Deals extra damage against rank-and-file enemies.

name: Radar Tuner
description: Radar immediately returns when you stop aiming down sights.

name: Targeting Adjuster
description: This weapon gains better target acquisition.

name: Backup Mag
description: Increases magazine.

name: Rapid Hit
description: Rapid precision hits temporarily increase stability and reload speed.

name: Rapid Hit
description: Rapid precision hits temporarily increase stability and reload speed substantially.

name: Fistfuls of Bullets
description: Melee kills overload the magazine to double its capacity.

name: Master of Arms
description: Kills with any weapon improve this weapon's damage for a short time.

name: Reservoir Burst
description: When the battery is full, your next burst deals additional damage and causes enemies to explode on death.

name: Reservoir Burst
description: When the battery is full, your next burst deals additional damage and causes targets to explode on death. Improves stability.

name: Onslaught
description: Final blows with this weapon increase its rate of fire.

name: Onslaught
description: Final blows with this weapon increase its rate of fire for an improved duration.

name: Archer's Tempo
description: Draw time decreases after every precision hit.

name: Chaos Reach
description:
Unleash a long-range channeled beam of concentrated Arc energy.
[Super]  : Use while active to deactivate Chaos Reach early and save Super energy.

name: Nova Warp
description:
Step between dimensions to subvert the laws of physics.
[Super Secondary]  : Teleport a short distance.
[Super Primary]  : Unleash a deadly Void eruption.

name: Well of Radiance
description: Thrust your Daybreak Sword into the ground. The Sword continuously projects a powerful aura that heals and empowers nearby allies, increasing their weapon damage and protecting them from the effects of Stasis.

name: Whirlwind Guard
description: [Block]  : Use while wielding your Arc Staff to deflect incoming projectiles. Deflecting projectiles triples Arc Staff damage for a short time.

name: Spectral Blades
description:
Summon a pair of deadly Void blades and stalk the battlefield in a veil of shadows.
[Light Attack]  : Perform a quick melee attack.
[Heavy Attack]  : Perform a heavy attack and once again vanish from sight.

name: Blade Barrage
description: Vault into the air and unleash a volley of Solar-charged explosive knives.

name: Thundercrash
description: Hurtle through the air like a missile and crash into enemies to inflict meteoric damage.

name: Banner Shield
description: Guard with Sentinel Shield to create a defensive wall. Allies who shoot through the wall have increased weapon damage, and Guarding allies makes the shield last longer.

name: Burning Maul
description: Summon a flaming maul and crush enemies with the force of an earthquake.

name: Mugunghwa Legion
description: You are in a supported Internet Game Room! While you are here, you may speak to Yuna to receive Exotic equipment.

name: Wish Granter's Presence
description: When the aura is active and you complete the "Last Wish" raid as a Guide, once per week you will earn a Bright Engram.

name: Precision Kill Ability Recharge
description: Precision kills grant grenade and melee energy.

name: Airborne Damage Resistance
description: Significant damage resistance while airborne.

name: Damage Increase I
description: Increased damage to all enemies.

name: Damage Increase II
description: Significantly increased damage to all enemies.

name: Terror Slayer I
description: Increased damage to Terrors.

name: Terror Slayer II
description: Significantly increased damage to Terrors.

name: Elite Slayer I
description: Increased damage to challenging enemies.

name: Elite Slayer II
description: Significantly increased damage to challenging enemies.

name: Health Regeneration
description: Precision kills trigger health regeneration.

name: Heavy Ammo Finder
description: Increases the drop chance of Heavy ammo on kill.

name: Guardians United
description: When in a fireteam with a linked friend, increases experience gains up to level 50.

name: Soulsknot
description: Adds a ribbon of spectral energy to your transmat effects.

name: Arachnophile
description: Adds a nest of spiders to your transmat effects.

name: Reign Havoc
description: Final blows generate lightning strikes. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

name: Lightning Rounds
description: This weapon fires faster and more accurately the longer the trigger is held. Continuous damage generates stunning lightning strikes.

name: Feeding Frenzy
description: Each rapid kill with this weapon progressively increases reload speed for a short time.

name: Feeding Frenzy
description: Each rapid final blow with this weapon progressively increases reload speed substantially for a short time.

name: Charge Shot
description: Hold down the trigger to charge up a tracking shot that explodes and burns on impact.

name: Arc Traps
description: Grenades stick to surfaces and chain Arc bolts.

name: Fan Fire
description: This weapon fires full auto and is more effective in hip-fire.

name: Poison Arrows
description: Fires poison arrows on full draw and quick release. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

name: Honed Edge
description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : Consume the magazine and load a more powerful round.

name: Honed Edge
description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : Consume the magazine and load a more powerful round.

name: Air Assault
description: Final blows grant a stacking bonus to airborne effectiveness. Final blows while airborne grant increased stacks.

name: Air Assault
description: Final blows grant an improved stacking bonus to airborne effectiveness. Final blows while airborne grant increased stacks.

name: Surrounded
description: This weapon gains bonus damage when three or more enemies are in close proximity.

name: Surrounded
description: This weapon gains improved bonus damage when three or more targets are in close proximity.

name: Micro-Missile
description: This weapon fires in a straight line and has a massively increased projectile speed.

name: Shield Disorient
description: Energy matched shield explosion disorients nearby combatants.

name: Rampage Spec
description: Increases duration of Rampage.

name: Dragonfly Spec

name: Sprint Grip
description: Temporarily increases the weapon's ready speed and aim down sights speed after sprinting.

name: Surrounded Spec
description: Increases the damage granted by Surrounded. Bonus damage lingers for a brief time when no longer surrounded by three or more enemies.

name: Quick Access Sling
description: Increases this weapon's ready and stow speed.

name: Radar Booster
description: Slightly increases the range at which radar detects enemies.

name: Rapid-Fire Frame
description: Deep ammo reserves. Fast reload when empty.

name: Disruption Break
description: Breaking an enemy's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for a brief period.

name: Disruption Break
description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for an improved duration.

name: Trench Barrel
description: After a successful melee hit, this weapon gains increased damage, handling, and reload speed for a short duration—or until three shots are fired.

name: Trench Barrel
description: After a successful melee hit, this weapon gains increased damage, improved handling, and improved reload speed for a short duration—or until three shots are fired.

description: Missing a shot has an improved chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.

name: Arc Empowerment
description:
While Arc empowered:
- Arc Supers have extended durations.
- Air and ground speed increases.
- Slide distance increases.
- Weapon handling and reload speed increases.
- Melee damage increases.
- Sword damage and lunge range increases.
- Sword ammo is granted every second while equipped.

On PRISM Day, Arc empowerment is applied while using an Arc subclass.

name: Solar Empowerment
description:
While Solar empowered:
- Solar Supers have extended durations.
- You radiate damaging Solar energy.
- Damage resistance increases.
- You heal passively.

On PRISM Day, Solar empowerment is applied while using a Solar subclass.

name: Void Empowerment
description:
While Void empowered:
- Void Supers have extended durations.
- Void grenades and melee attacks deal increased damage.
- Crouching grants invisibility, Truesight, increased energy regeneration, and increased mobility.

On PRISM Day, Void empowerment is applied while using a Void subclass.

name: Stasis Empowerment
description:
While Stasis empowered:
- Stasis Supers have extended durations.
- Defeated combatants spawn Stasis mines.

On PRISM Day, Stasis empowerment is applied while using a Stasis subclass.

name: Boon of Friendship
description:
Grants a Dawning reward to your fireteam upon completion of a playlist activity, with additional rewards based on the number of players with Boons active.

Effect lasts until a reward is earned. Only one Boon of Friendship may be active per player.

name: Snowstorm

name: Bronze Contender's Boon
description:
This buff commemorates your Bronze Tier score in the Guardian Games: Training or Competitive modes.

Defeating combatants with abilities grants increased weapon damage, while defeating combatants with weapons grants increased ability recharge speed. 

This is active only in Guardian Games playlist activities and will expire on weekly reset.

name: Silver Contender's Boon
description:
This buff commemorates your Silver Tier score in the Guardian Games: Training or Competitive modes.

Defeating combatants with abilities grants increased weapon damage, while defeating combatants with weapons grants increased ability recharge speed.

Empowerment stacks 3 times.

While at maximum empowerment, defeat combatants to gain a boost to mobility.

This is active only in Guardian Games playlist activities and will expire on weekly reset.

name: Gold Contender's Boon
description:
This buff commemorates your Gold Tier score in the Guardian Games: Training or Competitive modes.

Defeating combatants with abilities grants increased weapon damage, while defeating combatants with weapons grants increased ability recharge speed.

Empowerment stacks 5 times.

While at maximum empowerment, defeat combatants to gain a boost to mobility, accuracy, handling, and reload.

This is active only in Guardian Games playlist activities and will expire on weekly reset.

name: Whisper of Bonds

name: Whisper of Shards

name: Tectonic Harvest
description: Shattering a [Stasis] Stasis crystal creates a [Stasis] Stasis shard. This shard grants melee energy when picked up by you or your allies.

name: Winter's Shroud

name: Shatterdive

name: Frostpulse

name: Cryoclasm

Summon two Stasis kamas, Silence and Squall, that you throw one after another.

Silence : Creates a flash-freeze blast that freezes and damages targets.

Squall : Creates a Stasis Storm that slows and damages targets caught inside.

name: Glacial Quake
description:
Summon a [Stasis] Stasis gauntlet. While your Super is active:

[Heavy Attack]  : Slam your gauntlet down to create a shockwave that freezes targets and sends out [Stasis] Stasis crystals to freeze additional ones.

[Light Attack]  : Supercharge your Shiver Strike for bonus damage. Sprint through [Stasis] Stasis crystals or frozen targets to shatter them instantly.

name: Winter's Wrath
description:
Summon a [Stasis] Stasis staff. While your Super is active:

[Super Primary]  : Cast out a barrage of [Stasis] Stasis shards that freeze targets.

[Super Secondary]  : Cast out a shockwave that shatters all frozen targets.

Duskfield Grenade: Increases slow-field size and creates a small [Stasis] Stasis crystal on impact.

name: Vex Striker

name: Stylish Executioner
description:
Defeating a weakened, suppressed, or volatile target grants Invisibility and Truesight.

After performing a Stylish Execution, your next melee attack while invisible weakens targets.

name: Trapper's Ambush
description:
Activate Quickfall to spend your melee charge and dive to the ground, creating a large smoke cloud on impact, which then dissipates. Targets caught in the cloud are weakened, and allies are made invisible.

Your Smoke Bomb makes nearby allies invisible when it attaches to nearby surfaces or targets.

name: Feed the Void
description:
Defeat a target with a Void ability to activate Devour.

Your Devour effects are improved, restoring additional health and grenade energy.

name: Chaos Accelerant
description:
[Grenade] : Hold to overcharge your grenade, making it deadlier and more effective.

Vortex Grenade: Increases the size and linger duration of the vortex.

Axion Bolt: Creates an additional seeker.

Scatter Grenade: Has submunitions track to nearby targets.

Magnetic Grenade: Releases a short-range Void blast.

name: Controlled Demolition
description: Hitting a target with a Void ability or Volatile explosion makes them volatile. Further damage to a volatile target causes them to explode. Grants you and nearby allies health when volatile targets explode near you.

name: Offensive Bulwark
description:
While you have an Overshield or are inside Ward of Dawn, your grenade charges significantly faster, you have increased melee range and damage, and melee final blows extend the duration of your Overshield.

You gain an additional shield throw while in Sentinel Shield.

name: Echo of Expulsion
description: Void ability final blows cause targets to explode.

name: Echo of Provision
description: Damaging targets with grenades grants melee energy.

name: Echo of Exchange
description: Melee final blows grant grenade energy.

name: Echo of Remnants
description: Your lingering grenade effects (Vortex Grenade, Void Wall, Void Spike, and Axion Bolt) have increased duration.

name: Echo of Reprisal
description: Final blows when surrounded by combatants grant Super energy.

name: Echo of Undermining
description: Your Void grenades weaken targets.

name: Echo of Persistence
description: Void buffs applied to you (Invisibility, Overshield, and Devour) have increased duration.

name: Echo of Leeching
description: Melee final blows start health regeneration for you and nearby allies.

name: Echo of Domineering
description:
After suppressing a target, you gain greatly increased mobility for a short duration, and your equipped weapon is reloaded from reserves.

Defeating suppressed targets creates a Void Breach.

name: Echo of Dilation
description: While crouched, you sneak faster and gain enhanced radar resolution.

name: Echo of Instability
description: Defeating targets with grenades grants Volatile Rounds to your Void weapons.

name: Echo of Harvest
description: Defeating weakened targets creates an Orb of Power and a Void Breach.

name: Echo of Obscurity
description: Finisher final blows grant Invisibility.

name: Echo of Starvation
description: Picking up a Void Breach or an Orb of Power grants Devour.

name: Nova Warp
description:
Step between dimensions to subvert the laws of physics.

[Super Secondary]  : Teleport a short distance.

[Super Primary]  : Unleash a deadly Void eruption. A fully charged attack makes targets volatile.

name: Nova Bomb: Vortex
description:
Hurl an explosive bolt of Void Light at a target, disintegrating those caught within its blast.

Nova Bomb creates a singularity that pulls targets inward and continually damages those trapped inside.

name: Nova Bomb: Cataclysm
description:
Hurl an explosive bolt of Void Light at a target, disintegrating those caught within its blast.

Nova Bomb travels slowly and seeks targets. Detonations shatter into smaller seeker projectiles.

name: Ward of Dawn
description: Create an indestructible dome to protect you and your allies. Passing through Ward of Dawn grants you and your allies a temporary increase to weapon damage.

name: Sentinel Shield
description:
[Super]  : Summon a shield of Void Light. 
While Sentinel Shield is active:
[Light Attack]  : Attack.
[Block]  : Block.
[Grenade]  : Perform a Shield Throw.

Guard with Sentinel Shield to create a defensive wall. Allies who shoot through the wall have increased weapon damage, and guarding allies makes the shield last longer.

name: Shadowshot: Deadfall
description:
Tether foes to a Void Anchor, weakening and suppressing them for you and your allies.

The Void Anchors fired from Shadowshot pull targets toward the impact point, which then become traps and wait for prey. Void Anchors have increased range and last longer.

name: Spectral Blades
description:
Summon a pair of deadly Void blades and stalk the battlefield in a veil of shadows.

[Light Attack]  : Perform a quick melee attack.

[Heavy Attack]  : Perform a heavy attack that weakens your target, and once again vanish from sight.

name: Shadowshot: Moebius Quiver
description:
Tether foes to a Void Anchor, weakening and suppressing them for you and your allies.

Fire two volleys of three Void Arrows that seek nearby targets. Shadowshot makes targets volatile and deals increased damage to tethered targets. Defeating tethered targets creates Orbs of Power.

name: Capsule Gang Entrance
description: Adds a neo-capsule appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Signal Intercept
description: Adds a modified Black Armory theme to your transmat effects.

name: Lucent Shrieker Entrance
description: Adds a Lucent Hive Shrieker to your transmat effects.

name: Arc Staff
description:
Form a staff of pure Arc energy and acrobatically take out your foes.

[Block] : Hold to deflect incoming projectiles with your Arc staff.

name: Gathering Storm
description:
Hurl your Arc Staff forward, embedding it into surfaces or large targets and jolting nearby targets.

After a short time, a devastating lightning bolt strikes the staff, overcharging it with Arc energy. While overcharged, your staff discharges lightning at nearby foes.

name: Fists of Havoc
description:
Supercharge your fists and slam the ground with the force of a maelstrom. While active:

[Light Attack]  : Quickly charge forward, dealing damage to any impacted targets.

[Heavy Attack] : Slam your fists to the ground, blinding targets and dealing damage in an area around you, leaving aftershocks in your wake. Performing a slam from the air deals additional damage.

name: Thundercrash
description: Hurtle through the air like a missile and crash into targets to inflict meteoric damage.

name: Stormtrance
description:
Chain Arc Lightning from your hands to electrify targets with devastating streams of Arc Light that intensify over time. Casting Stormtrance creates a jolting shockwave underneath you.

[Sprint]  : Teleport forward, consuming a small amount of Super energy.

name: Chaos Reach
description:
Unleash a long-range channeled beam of concentrated Arc energy. Sustained damage on a single target creates a jolting lightning strike at their position.

 [Super]  while active to deactivate your Super early, saving Super energy.

name: Spark of Beacons
description: While you are amplified, your Arc Special weapon final blows create a blinding explosion.

name: Spark of Resistance
description: While surrounded by combatants, you are more resistant to incoming damage.

name: Spark of Momentum
description: Sliding over ammo bricks reloads your equipped weapon and grants a small amount of melee energy.

name: Spark of Shock
description: Your Arc grenades jolt targets.

name: Spark of Ions
description: Defeating a jolted target creates an Ionic Trace.

name: Spark of Discharge
description: Arc weapon final blows have a chance to create an Ionic Trace.

name: Spark of Frequency
description: Melee hits greatly increase your reload speed for a short duration.

name: Spark of Focus
description: After sprinting for a short time, your class ability regeneration is increased.

name: Spark of Recharge
description: While critically wounded, your melee and grenade energy regenerates more quickly.

name: Spark of Magnitude
description: Your lingering Arc grenades (Lightning Grenade, Pulse Grenade, and Storm Grenade) have extended duration.

name: Spark of Amplitude
description: Rapidly defeating targets while you are amplified creates an Orb of Power.

name: Spark of Feedback
description: Taking melee damage briefly increases your outgoing melee damage.

name: Spark of Volts
description: Finishers make you amplified.

name: Spark of Brilliance
description: Defeating a blinded target with precision damage creates a blinding explosion.

name: Touch of Thunder
description:
Your Flashbang, Pulse, Lightning, and Storm Grenades have enhanced functionality.

Flashbang Grenade: Emits an additional blinding flash on bounce.

Pulse Grenade: Creates Ionic Traces periodically as it damages targets and increases in damage over time.

Lightning Grenade: Grants an additional grenade charge, and jolts targets hit by the initial blast.

Storm Grenade: After detonating, creates a roaming thundercloud that tracks nearby targets and fires bolts of lightning at foes beneath it.

name: Juggernaut
description:
With full class ability energy and after sprinting for a short time, you gain a frontal shield that blocks incoming damage. When the frontal shield breaks, your class ability energy is depleted.

While amplified, the shield blocks significantly more damage before breaking.

name: Knockout
description:
Critically wounding a target or breaking their shield infuses your melee attacks with Arc energy and increases your melee range and damage for a short time.

Defeating targets with melee attacks starts health regeneration and makes you amplified.

name: Flow State
description:
Defeating a jolted target makes you amplified.

While you are amplified, your dodge recharges more quickly, you are more resilient while dodging, and your reload speed is greatly increased.

name: Tempest Strike
description: While sliding, activate your charged melee ability to unleash a devastating uppercut attack that travels along the ground in front of you, damaging and jolting targets it hits.

name: Lethal Current
description:
After dodging, your next melee attack has increased lunge range, jolts the target, and creates a damaging aftershock.

Damaging any jolted target with melee attacks also blinds them.

name: Electrostatic Mind
description:
Defeating targets with Arc abilities or defeating jolted or blinded targets creates an Ionic Trace.

Collecting an Ionic Trace makes you amplified.

name: Lightning Surge
description: While sliding, activate your charged melee ability to blink forward, calling down lightning strikes that jolt targets as you rematerialize.

name: Arc Soul
description:
Cast your Rift to create an Arc Soul that fires at targets in front of you. Allies can pass through your Rift to get an Arc Soul. Your Rift charges faster when allies are near.

While amplified, your Arc Souls are supercharged and gain increased fire rate.

name: Will of Light (Kinetic)
description: Your equipped weapons that deal Kinetic damage deal increased damage to Taken combatants.

name: Old Gods' Boon
description: Gain damage reduction while carrying the King's Fall relic.

name: Run for Your Life
description: Gain increased mobility and resilience while you are Torn Between Dimensions.

name: Mortal Medicine
description: Gain increased recovery and weapon reload speed while you have a Brand or are in a pool of Reclaimed Light.

name: Will of Light (Arc)
description: Your equipped weapons that deal Arc damage deal increased damage to Taken combatants.

name: Will of Light (Solar)
description: Your equipped weapons that deal Solar damage deal increased damage to Taken combatants.

name: Will of Light (Stasis)
description: Your equipped weapons that deal Stasis damage deal increased damage to Taken combatants.

name: Will of Light (Void)
description: Your equipped weapons that deal Void damage deal increased damage to Taken combatants.

name: Machine Gun Holster
description: Gradually reloads your stowed Machine Guns over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

name: Bottomless Bounty I
description: Improves the effect of the Right Hook and Runneth Over weapon Origin perks.

name: Glaive Loader
description: Increases reload speed of Glaives.

name: Focusing Strike
description: Grants class ability energy when you cause damage with a powered melee attack.

name: Machine Gun Scavenger
description: Machine Guns get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

name: Bottomless Bounty II
description: Improves the effect of the Soul Drinker and Hot Swap weapon Origin perks.

name: Overload Machine Guns
description:
Uninterrupted fire from your equipped Machine Guns grants bullets that stun combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

name: Anti-Barrier Snipers
description:
Scout Rifles you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds, which bypass combatant defenses.

Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

name: Bad Amplitude
description: Damaging a Champion with an Arc ability causes the Champion to become jolted.

name: Surge Detonators
description:
Arc grenades disrupt combatants, stunning them and delaying ability regeneration, and lower combatant damage output. 

Strong against Overload Champions.

name: Inferno Whip
description:
Solar melee abilities stun unshielded combatants. 

Strong against Unstoppable Champions.

name: Thunderous Retort
description: Grants bonus Arc Super damage if cast while critically wounded or while amplified. Lasts until the end of the Super activation.

name: Amped Up
description: Stay amplified longer.

name: Trace Evidence
description: Dealing precision damage to combatants affected by Arc debuffs spawns an Ionic Trace.

name: Lightning Strikes Twice
description: After throwing an Arc grenade, gain increased grenade recharge for a short time. Arc final blows extend the duration of this benefit.

name: Sundering Glare
description: Rapid precision hits against distant combatants weaken them for a short duration.

name: See Me, Feel Me
description: After being invisible, your Void weapons gain Volatile Rounds. Finishers while invisible grant bonus damage for all weapons and a reserve overshield for allies.

name: Hammer of the Gods
description: Gain melee energy and create lightning strikes with Thunderclap.

name: Ionic Conductor
description: Improved ionic traces

name: Traitor's Vessel
description: Hip shots fire widespread. Final blows generate Ionic Traces.

name: Tempest Cascade
description: Ionic Traces load a jolting round.

name: Rocket Tracers
description: Land multiple hits to fire homing micro-rockets.

name: Grenade Chaser
description: Landing multiple rockets loads a grenade. [Alternate Weapon Action]  to switch into Grenade Launcher mode.

name: Nano-entanglement
description: This weapon's damage type becomes Strand. Final blows with grenades from this weapon create Tangles.

name: Touch of Malice
description: Final round drains life force to deal extra damage.

name: Charged with Blight
description: Precision hits drain combatants' life force and charge up a ball of Darkness. [Alternate Weapon Action]  and then fire to unleash the blight projectile, shrouding combatants in Darkness and temporarily blinding them.

name: Return Stroke
description: Causing a lightning strike with this weapon partially reloads the magazine from reserves.

name: Ionic Interment
description: Collecting an Ionic Trace partially reloads the magazine from reserves.

name: Gutshot Straight
description: Aiming down sights increases body shot damage, decreases target acquisition.

name: Gutshot Straight
description: Aiming down sights increases body shot damage but decreases target acquisition slightly.

name: Slickdraw
description: Significantly increases handling, significantly decreases target acquisition.

name: Slickdraw
description: Significantly increases handling, decreases target acquisition.

name: Under-Over
description: Deals bonus damage to targets with overshields. Deals a small amount of bonus damage to combatant shields.

name: Under-Over
description: Deals improved bonus damage to targets with overshields. Deals a small amount of bonus damage to combatant shields.

name: Pugilist
description:
Final blows with this weapon generate melee energy. 
Dealing melee damage briefly improves this weapon's handling.

name: Pugilist
description:
Final blows with this weapon generate improved melee energy. 
Dealing melee damage briefly improves this weapon's handling.

name: Voltshot
description: Reloading this weapon after defeating a target overcharges this weapon for a short period of time, causing it to jolt on its next hit.

name: Voltshot
description: Reloading this weapon after defeating a target overcharges this weapon for an improved short period of time, causing it to jolt on its next hit.

name: Search Party
description: This weapon is granted faster aim down sights speed and movement speed while aiming down sights when no allies are near.

name: Hot Swap
description:
Switching to this weapon while you are damaged strongly increases its handling for a short duration.

Swords gain increased charge speed, guard resistance, and guard endurance instead.

name: Runneth Over
description: Reloading near allies overflows the magazine.

name: Runneth Over
description: Reloading near allies overflows the magazine an improved amount.

name: Right Hook
description:
Dealing melee damage gives this weapon increased target acquisition and range for a short period of time.
Dealing melee damage again extends the effect.

name: Cannon Fodder
description: Adds a cannon appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Dreaming Shimmer
description: Adds an Awoken pointillistic appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Pumpkin Bomb
description: Adds a pumpkin appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Thar Be Treasure!
description: Adds a treasure chest appearance to your transmat effects.

name: End of the Rainbow
description: Adds a rainbow appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Gunpowder Gamble
description:
Defeat targets with Solar abilities, Solar debuffs, or Solar weapons to charge up an improvised Solar explosive.

[Grenade]  : Throw a Solar explosive that can be shot in mid-air to cause an ignition.

name: Knock 'Em Down
description:
Your Solar Supers are enhanced. Deadshot Golden Gun has damage resistance, Marksman Golden Gun has increased duration, and Blade Barrage launches more projectiles.

While radiant, final blows with your equipped Throwing Knife fully refund your melee energy.

name: On Your Mark
description:
Precision final blows grant you and nearby allies increased weapon handling and reload speed for a short duration. Stacks 3 times.

Activating your class ability immediately grants maximum stacks of On Your Mark.

name: Consecration
description:
While sliding, activate your charged melee ability to launch a wave of [Solar] Solar energy forward, damaging and scorching targets in front of you as you leap into the air.

While airborne, activate your charged melee again to slam to the ground and create a second larger wave of damaging [Solar] Solar energy. If the wave hits a scorched target, they ignite.

name: Roaring Flames
description: Final blows with [Solar] Solar abilities or ignitions increase the damage of your Solar abilities. Stacks 3 times.

name: Sol Invictus
description:
Solar ability final blows, Hammer of Sol impacts, and defeating scorched targets creates Sunspots. Your abilities regenerate faster, and your Super drains more slowly while standing in a Sunspot.

Sunspots apply scorch and deal damage to targets inside. Entering a Sunspot applies restoration.

name: Icarus Dash
description:
[Air Dodge]  : Dodge quickly while airborne.

While Heat Rises is active, you have an additional dodge.

While airborne, rapidly defeating targets with your Super or weapons cures you.

name: Heat Rises
description:
You can fire weapons, melee, and throw grenades while gliding.

[Grenade]  : Hold to consume your grenade, gaining Heat Rises and releasing a burst of healing energy that cures nearby allies. The strength of the burst is increased when a Healing Grenade is consumed.

Final blows while airborne increase the duration of Heat Rises and grant melee energy.

name: Touch of Flame
description:
Your Healing, Solar, Firebolt, and Fusion Grenades have enhanced functionality.

Healing Grenade: Improves the strength of cure and restoration effects applied. Consuming a Healing Grenade with Heat Rises also applies restoration to nearby allies.

Solar Grenade: Increases linger duration. Periodically emits blobs of lava around its perimeter.

Firebolt Grenade: Increases target search radius and maximum target count.

Fusion Grenade: Explodes twice.

name: Gunpowder Gamble
description:
Defeat targets with Solar abilities, Solar debuffs, or Solar weapons to charge up an improvised Solar explosive.

[Grenade]  : Throw a Solar explosive that can be shot in mid-air to cause an ignition.

name: Ember of Singeing
description: Your class ability recharges faster when you scorch targets.

name: Ember of Benevolence
description: Applying restoration, cure,  or radiant to allies grants increased grenade, melee, and class ability regeneration for a short duration.

name: Ember of Beams
description: Your Solar Super projectiles have stronger target acquisition.

name: Ember of Empyrean
description: Solar weapon or ability final blows extend the duration of restoration and radiant effects applied to you.

name: Ember of Combustion
description: Final blows with a Solar Super causes targets to ignite and creates a Firesprite.

name: Ember of Torches
description: Powered melee attacks against combatants make you and nearby allies radiant.

name: Ember of Char
description: Your Solar ignitions spread scorch to affected targets.

name: Ember of Tempering
description:
Solar weapon final blows grant you and your allies increased recovery for a short duration. Stacks 3 times.

While Ember of Tempering is active, your weapons have increased airborne effectiveness, and your Solar weapon final blows create a Firesprite.

name: Ember of Blistering
description: Defeating targets with Solar ignitions grants grenade energy.

name: Ember of Solace
description: Radiant and restoration effects applied to you have increased duration.

name: Ember of Eruption
description: Your Solar ignitions have increased area of effect.

name: Ember of Ashes
description: You apply more scorch stacks to targets.

name: Ember of Wonder
description: Rapidly defeating multiple targets with Solar ignitions generates an Orb of Power.

name: Ember of Searing
description: Defeating scorched targets grants melee energy and creates a Firesprite.

name: Golden Gun - Deadshot
description:
Summon a rapid-fire flaming pistol that disintegrates targets with Solar Light.

Causing Solar ignitions while your Super is active refunds a Golden Gun round.

Benefits from being radiant.

name: Golden Gun - Marksman
description:
Summon a precision flaming pistol that disintegrates targets with Solar Light.

Your Golden Gun deals massively increased precision damage, overpenetrates targets, and creates Orbs of Power on precision hits.

Benefits from being radiant.

name: Blade Barrage
description: Vault into the air and unleash a volley of Solar-charged explosive knives.

name: Hammer of Sol
description:
Summon a flaming hammer and wreak destruction down upon your enemies.

[Light Attack]  : Throw your hammer at foes.

Upon impact, your hammers shatter into explosive molten shards.

name: Burning Maul
description:
Summon a flaming maul and crush targets with the force of an earthquake.

[Light Attack]  : Spin the maul in a circle around you, damaging nearby targets.

[Heavy Attack]  : Slam the maul to the ground and create a cyclone of flames that seeks targets, dealing damage and scorching them.

name: Daybreak
description:
Fashion Solar Light into blades and smite your foes from the sky.

Your Daybreak projectiles launch a streak of deadly flames on impact.

name: Well of Radiance
description: Thrust your sword into the ground, damaging and scorching nearby combatants. The sword projects a continuous aura, granting radiant effects and restoration to nearby allies, protecting them from the effects of Stasis.

name: Unrepentant
description: Reloading after defeating a target grants a superburst.

name: Be the Danger
description: Unrepentant final blows refund Unrepentant.

name: Exhumation
description: Charged heavy attacks turn you invisible.

name: Shot in the Dark
description: Increases damage and weakens while invisible.

name: Wraithwalk
description: Faster movement while invisible.

name: Well-Rounded
description:
Throwing a grenade or hitting a target with a charged melee grants a stacking bonus to weapon stability, handling, and range.

Using a Super grants maximum stacks.

name: Well-Rounded
description:
Throwing a grenade or hitting a target with a charged melee grants an improved stacking bonus to weapon stability, handling, and range.

Using a Super grants maximum stacks.

name: Incandescent
description:
Defeating a target spreads scorch to those nearby.
More powerful combatants and opposing Guardians cause scorch in a larger radius.

name: Incandescent
description:
Defeating a target spreads a longer lasting scorch to those nearby.
More powerful combatants and opposing Guardians cause scorch in a larger radius.

name: Repulsor Brace
description: Defeating a Void-debuffed target grants an overshield.

name: Repulsor Brace
description: Defeating a Void-debuffed target grants an overshield that lasts for an improved duration.

name: Fragile Focus
description: This weapon gains bonus range until your shield is destroyed. The bonus returns once your shield has regenerated to full strength.

name: Fragile Focus
description: This weapon gains bonus range until your shield is destroyed. The bonus returns more quickly once your shield has regenerated to full strength.

name: Aggressive Frame
description: Fires a three-round burst.

name: Killing Tally
description: Kills increase this weapon's damage until it is stowed or reloaded.

name: Killing Tally
description: Final blows increase this weapon's damage until it is stowed or reloaded. Improves magazine size.

name: Dream Work
description: Once per reload, assists or assisted final blows partially refill the weapon from reserves, potentially overflowing the magazine.

name: To Excess
description: Final blows with this weapon while your Super is full grant a bonus to Strength and Discipline for a moderate duration.

name: Extrovert
description: Final blows while near multiple combatants or near Nightmares restores health.

name: Bitterspite
description:
While this weapon is equipped, taking damage accelerates its next reload.

Taking more damage increases the effect.

name: Subjugator Entrance
description: Adds a resonant appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Ghost Purple
description: Adds a purple Ghost ring to your transmat effects.

name: Peach Spotlight Effects
description: Adds a peach spotlight to your transmat effects.

name: Egregore Entrance
description: Adds a spore cloud to your transmat effects.

name: Roast 'Em
description: Improves Proximity Knife effectiveness and regeneration speed.

name: Myrmidon's Reach
description: Improves your Shield Throw melee.

name: Soaring Fusilier
description: Air dodge reloads weapons. Fusion Rifle and Linear Fusion Rifle final blows make you radiant.

name: Piercing Sidearms
description:
Sidearms gain shield-piercing rounds, which bypass combatant defenses.

Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

name: Unstoppable Scout Rifle
description:
Aiming down sights for a short time causes Scout Rifles you wield to fire a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

name: Shotgun Holster
description: Gradually reloads your stowed Shotguns over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

name: Trace Rifle Ammo Finder
description: Increases your chance of finding Special ammo while you have a Trace Rifle equipped.

name: Nightmarish Opulence
description: Increases the duration of the Psychohack Origin Trait and the effect of the Extrovert Origin Trait.

name: Pulse Rifle Targeting
description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Pulse Rifles.

name: Sidearm Holster
description: Gradually reloads your stowed Sidearms over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

name: Trace Rifle Reserves
description: Increases the amount of Trace Rifle ammo you can carry.

name: Unquenchable Thirst
description: Increases the buff effect of the To Excess Origin Trait and the healing effect of the Souldrinker Origin Trait.

name: Solar Resistance
description: Reduces incoming Solar damage from combatants.

name: Void Resistance
description: Reduces incoming Void damage from combatants.

name: Overload Trace Rifles
description:
Uninterrupted fire from your equipped Trace Rifles causes the beam to stun combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

name: Revitalizing Blast
description: Stunning a Champion causes it to ignite and clears your shield stun.

name: Glaive of Dreams
description: While you have a Glaive equipped, the Unstable Essence buff gained by picking up objects dropped by Nightmares has double its normal duration.

name: Classy Restoration
description: Activating your Solar class abilities grants you restoration.

name: Radiant Orbs
description: Picking up an Orb of Power makes you radiant.

name: Rays of Precision
description: While radiant, Solar precision final blows cause combatants to ignite.

name: Flame Harvesting
description: Solar Exotic final blows create Solar elemental wells.

name: Solar Fulmination
description: Your ignitions do increased damage in an increased radius.

name: Glowing Embers
description: Glowing Embers

name: Shining Embers
description: Shining Embers

name: Spark of Mobility
description: Spark of Mobility

name: Spark of Recovery
description: Spark of Recovery

name: Spark of Resilience
description: Spark of Resilience

name: Spark of Discipline
description: Spark of Discipline

name: Spark of Intellect
description: Spark of Intellect

name: Spark of Strength
description: Spark of Strength

name: Vex Incursion Entrance
description: Adds a Vex incursion appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Swirling Leaf Entrance
description: Adds a green petal appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Gift Stack Entrance
description: Adds a tower of presents to your transmat effects.

name: Seraph Reboot Entrance
description: Adds a seraphic reboot appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Lancer's Vigil
description: Improves Diamond Lances

name: Hearts of Ice
description: Winter's Wrath Shockwave deals extra damage and buffs allies.

name: Tight Fit
description: Dodging grants reload, handling, and airborne effectiveness for you and nearby allies. Dodge and defeat targets to increase gains.

name: Grenade Launcher Holster
description: Gradually reloads your stowed Grenade Launchers over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

name: Legacy Ambush
description: Increases the duration and effectiveness of the Ambush Origin Trait and the Bray Inheritance Origin Trait.

name: In-Flight Compensator
description: Increases the airborne effectiveness of all equipped weapons.

name: Bow Dexterity
description: Faster ready and stow speed for Bows.

name: Mobile Retrofit
description: Increases mobility by +5.

name: Hand Cannon Targeting
description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Hand Cannons.

name: Pulse Rifle Loader
description: Increases reload speed of Pulse Rifles.

name: Energy Diffusion Substrate
description: Gain a small amount of resistance to all damage dealt to you by combatants. Additional copies of this mod will increase this effect.

name: Sharp Shooting
description: Greatly increases the duration and effectiveness of the Tex Balanced Stock Origin Trait and the Veist Stinger Origin Trait.

name: Resilient Retrofit
description: Increases resilience by +5.

name: Unstoppable Grenade Launcher
description:
When you ready or reload a Grenade Launcher, for a short period, that weapon stuns unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

name: Counter Charge
description: Become Charged with Light whenever you or a member of your fireteam stuns any Champion.

name: Advance Scout
description: Champions you stun take additional damage from teammates.

name: Lord Kelvin's Basilisk
description:
Void and Stasis grenades cause disruption, delaying ability regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

name: Low Entropy Superconductor
description:
Stasis and Arc melee abilities stun unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

name: Passive Aggressive Guard

name: Weakened Clear

name: Monochromatic Maestro
description: Dealing damage with elemental abilities grants increased damage to weapons of the same element for a short duration. Dealing damage with elemental weapons grants increased damage to abilities of the same element for a short duration.

name: Solo Operative
description: While you are the only member of your fireteam, you deal increased damage to all combatants.

name: Energy Accelerant
description: Your Dragonfly, Chain Reaction, and Firefly explosions deal more damage.

name: Hunter's Trace
description: Precision hits grant heavy rounds. Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

name: Guidance Ring
description: Charges and deploys a guidance system.

name: Apollonic Tangent
description: Arrows fired through a Guidance Ring release seeking projectiles, which do more damage based on distance traveled.

name: Panoptic Tessellation
description: Deploying a Guidance Ring or striking a target with a seeking projectile improves draw time and reload speed for a moderate duration.

name: Soaring Fang
description: Ground damage charges; airborne extends.

name: Flying Monster
description: Final blows with this weapon while airborne grant damage resistance.

name: Double Fire
description: Hard-hitting twin-fire rounds.

name: Aggressive Glaive
description: [Aim Down Sights]  : Raise shield

name: Häkke Light Burst Fire
description: Fires a stable burst of four lightweight rounds.

name: Häkke Heavy Burst Fire
description: Fires a less stable burst of two high-damage, high-range rounds.

name: Tex Balanced Stock
description: Damaging targets while firing from the hip increases handling, reload speed, and movement speed while aiming down sights.

name: Rasputin's Arsenal
description: Breaking a target's shield partially reloads this weapon's magazine.

name: Ambush
description: Improves range, handling, and damage against combatants during the opening moments of an engagement.

name: Dawning Surprise
description: Rapidly defeating targets awards a Dawning gift. Defeated powerful targets count as more than one.

name: Bray Inheritance
description: Dealing damage regenerates a small amount of ability energy.

name: Cascade Point
description: Final blows or sustained precision hits with another weapon increase this weapon's rate of fire for a short duration.

name: Cascade Point
description: Final blows or sustained precision hits with another weapon increase this weapon's rate of fire for an improved duration.

name: Offhand Strike
description: Final blows grant additional weapon range, stability, and accuracy when firing from the hip for a short duration.

name: Offhand Strike
description: Final blows grant additional weapon range, stability, and accuracy when firing from the hip for an improved duration.

name: Perfect Float
description: Being in combat for a moderate time increases airborne effectiveness and reduces flinch until you are out of combat.

name: Perfect Float
description: Being in combat for a moderate time increases airborne accuracy and reduces flinch until you are out of combat for an extended duration.

name: Shot Swap
description: Final blows build and store charges which allow you to swap and stow this weapon at a faster rate.

name: Shot Swap
description: Final blows build and store charges which allow you to swap and stow this weapon at an additionally improved rate.

name: Close to Melee
description: Glaive projectile final blows improve Glaive melee damage. Glaive projectile or melee damage extends the duration.

name: Close to Melee
description: Glaive projectile final blows improve Glaive melee damage for an improved duration. Glaive projectile or melee damage extends the duration.

name: Swooping Talons
description: Dealing damage while airborne increases this weapon's damage output.

name: Target Lock
description: Damage increases the longer this weapon remains on a target.

name: Target Lock
description: Damage increases by an improved amount the longer this weapon remains on a target.

name: Widow's Silk
description:
You have an additional grenade charge.

Your Grappling Hook creates a Grapple Tangle at the grapple point.

name: Drengr's Lash
description: Activate your class ability to create a ripple in reality that travels forward along the ground, suspending and damaging targets it hits.

name: Into the Fray
description:
Destroying a Tangle or casting your Super grants Woven Mail for nearby allies.

While you have Woven Mail, your melee regeneration rate is increased.

name: Drengr's Lash
description: Activate your class ability to create a ripple in reality that travels forward along the ground, suspending and damaging targets it hits.

name: Weaver's Call
description: Cast your Rift to weave three Threadlings and deploy any Threadlings you have perched.

name: Mindspun Invocation
description:
Your grapple, Shackle Grenade, and Threadling Grenade have enhanced functionality.

Your grapple melee spawns three Threadling eggs.

[Grenade]  : Hold to consume your Shackle Grenade and activate Weaver's Trance. Final blows while Weaver's Trance is active create a suspending detonation.

[Grenade]  : Hold to consume your Threadling Grenade and immediately generate five perched Threadlings.

name: Mindspun Invocation
description:
Your grapple, Shackle Grenade, and Threadling Grenade have enhanced functionality.

Your grapple melee spawns three Threadling eggs.

[Grenade]  : Hold to consume your Shackle Grenade and activate Weaver's Trance. Final blows while Weaver's Trance is active create a suspending detonation.

[Grenade]  : Hold to consume your Threadling Grenade and immediately generate five perched Threadlings.

name: Ensnaring Slam
description: Activate your air move to consume your class ability energy and dive to the ground, suspending all nearby targets on impact. Using this ability extends class ability cooldown time.

name: The Wanderer
description:
Tangles you throw attach to targets and detonate into a suspending burst. Destroying a Tangle creates a suspending burst after a short delay.

Threadling final blows create a Tangle.

name: Threaded Specter
description:
Activating your class ability leaves behind a decoy woven from [Strand] Strand matter that draws the attention of nearby combatants.

After taking significant damage or when combatants approach, the decoy detonates, dealing damage and releasing Threadlings that seek out and attack nearby foes.

name: Whirling Maelstrom
description: Destroying a Tangle will weave a violent, writhing mass of [Strand] Strand fibers. The Strand mass seeks out and damages targets, emitting Unraveling projectiles when it defeats them.

name: Flechette Storm
description:
While sliding, activate your charged melee ability to leap into the air, knocking nearby targets away and dealing damage.

While airborne, activate your charged melee again to launch a cluster of damaging, Unraveling projectiles. Repeatedly activating melee will chain additional throws.

name: Weavewalk
description:
[Air Dodge]  : Dodge while airborne to consume your melee energy and enter the weave, gaining damage resistance from combatants and players. Reactivate your air dodge or cast your Rift to exit the weave.

While in the weave, your melee energy is drained and you generate perched Threadlings over time.

name: Banner of War
description:
Defeat a target with a melee attack, finisher, or Sword to raise a Banner of War that pulses with energy, periodically healing nearby allies and increasing melee and Sword damage. 

Targets defeated by you and nearby allies charge the banner, increasing the speed of its pulses.

name: Thread of Mind
description: Defeating suspended targets grants class ability energy.

name: Thread of Fury
description: Damaging targets with a Tangle grants melee energy.

name: Thread of Ascent
description: Activating your grenade ability reloads your equipped weapon and grants bonus airborne effectiveness and handling for a short duration.

name: Thread of Finality
description: Finisher final blows create Threadlings.

name: Thread of Warding
description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants Woven Mail.

name: Thread of Wisdom
description: Defeating suspended targets creates an Orb of Power.

name: Thread of Rebirth
description: [Strand] Strand weapon final blows have a chance to create a Threadling.

name: Thread of Transmutation
description: While you have Woven Mail, weapon final blows create a Tangle.

name: Thread of Propagation
description: Powered melee final blows grant your [Strand] Strand weapons Unraveling Rounds.

name: Thread of Evolution
description: Threadlings travel farther and deal additional damage.

name: Thread of Isolation
description: Landing rapid precision hits emits a severing burst from the target.

name: Thread of Binding
description: Super final blows emit a suspending burst from the target.

name: Thread of Generation
description: Dealing damage generates grenade energy.

name: Thread of Continuity
description: Suspend, unravel, and sever effects applied to targets have increased duration.

name: Frozen Ordnance

name: Frozen Striker

name: Elemental Shards

name: Supreme Shardmaker
description: Casting your Super spawns three Stasis shards near you.

name: Echo of Vigilance
description: Defeating a target while your shields are depleted grants you a temporary Void overshield.

name: Echo of Cessation
description:
Finisher final blows create a burst of Void damage that causes nearby combatants to become volatile.

Defeating volatile targets creates a Void Breach.

name: Ember of Mercy
description:
When you revive an ally, you and other nearby allies gain restoration.

Picking up a Firesprite grants restoration.

name: Ember of Resolve
description: Solar grenade final blows cure you.

name: Spark of Haste
description: You have greatly increased resilience, recovery, and mobility while sprinting.

name: Spark of Instinct
description: While critically wounded, taking damage emits a burst of damaging Arc energy that jolts targets.

name: M1R Distribution Matrix
description: Guarding grants overshields to allies.

name: Heavy Metal
description: Every fourth bullet weakens targets.

name: Big Frigid Glaive
description: Fires a projectile that freezes.

name: All at Once
description: Hold fire to load; release for a burst.

name: Hail Barrage
description: Fires Stasis arrows.

name: Split Decision
description: Fires Stasis and Solar pellets quickly.

name: Perpetual Loophole

name: Hail Storm
description: Direct hits with Stasis arrows freeze combatants and slow opposing Guardians. Stasis arrows that impact the environment create Stasis crystals.

name: Weighted Edge
description: This weapon's melee attacks deal increased damage and slow targets when loaded with ammo.

name: Pick Your Poison
description:
Hipfiring: Projectiles will track marked targets, dealing increased body shot damage on impact.

Aiming: Projectiles have greatly increased velocity and deal extra critical hit damage to marked targets.

name: Paracausal Pellets
description: Landing nearly all Stasis pellets will freeze targets; landing nearly all Solar pellets will ignite targets.

name: Vexadecimal
description: While holding down the trigger, every fourth Heavy Metal projectile also makes targets volatile on impact.

name: Third Tail
description: Adds another rocket to the volley that deals Arc damage and jolts combatants.

name: Keep Away
description: Increases reload, range, and accuracy when no targets are in close proximity.

name: Keep Away
description: Significantly increases reload, range, and accuracy when no targets are in close proximity.

name: Replenishing Aegis
description: Blocking damage partially reloads this weapon from reserves.

name: Replenishing Aegis
description: Blocking damage partially reloads this weapon from reserves. Shortens delay between activations.

name: Envious Assassin
description: Defeating targets with other weapons before drawing this one transfers ammo to the magazine from reserves. This effect can overflow the magazine based on the number of targets defeated.

name: Envious Assassin
description: Defeating targets with other weapons before drawing this one transfers additional ammo to the magazine from reserves. This effect can overflow the magazine based on the number of targets defeated.

name: Valiant Charge
description: Receiving damage while guarding temporarily increases Sword lunge distance.

name: Valiant Charge
description: Receiving damage while guarding temporarily increases Sword lunge distance for an improved duration.

name: Kinetic Tremors
description: Sustained kinetic damage to a target emits a shockwave that damages any nearby targets.

name: Kinetic Tremors
description: Sustained kinetic damage to a target emits a shockwave that damages any nearby targets. Perk activates more quickly.

name: Hatchling
description: Precision final blows or rapidly defeating targets with a non-precision weapon spawns a Threadling at the target's location.

name: Hatchling
description: Precision final blows or rapidly defeating targets with a non-precision weapon spawns a Threadling at the target's location. Improves handling.

name: Destabilizing Rounds
description: Final blows cause nearby targets to become volatile.

name: Destabilizing Rounds
description: Final blows cause nearby targets to become volatile. Cooldown between activations reduced.

name: Shiver Quiver
description: Freezing or slowing a target grants this weapon faster draw speed for a short period of time.

name: Paracausal Affinity
description: Final blows of energy types matching this weapon's alignment grant increased damage for a short period of time. Light final blows boost Arc, Solar, and Void weapons. Darkness final blows boost Stasis and Strand weapons.

name: Paracausal Affinity
description: Final blows of energy types matching this weapon's alignment grant increased damage for an improved duration. Light final blows boost Arc, Solar, and Void weapons. Darkness final blows boost Stasis and Strand weapons.

name: Field-Tested
description:
Defeating targets or dealing damage with this weapon gradually increases range, stability, handling, and reload speed.

Swords gain increased charge rate and guard resistance.

name: Harmonic Resonance
description: Equipping multiple weapons from this set grants this weapon increased reload speed and handling. It also deals increased damage versus Tormentors, Lucent Hive, and Guardians using their Supers.

name: Noble Deeds

name: Nanotech Tracer Rockets

name: Compressed Wave Frame

name: You gain a bonus to mobility while you have any Armor Charge. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.
description: You gain a bonus to mobility while you have any Armor Charge. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

name: Emergency Reinforcement

When your shields become broken, you gain temporary damage reduction.

Consumes 3 or more stacks of Armor Charge, granting a longer duration to the damage reduction for each charge consumed.

name: Benevolent Finisher
description:
Using a finisher on a combatant spawns Orbs of Power for your allies. 

Consumes 3 stacks of Armor Charge.

description: Your decaying Armor Charge has a longer duration.

name: Font of Restoration
description: You gain a bonus to recovery while you have any Armor Charge. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

name: Proximity Ward

name: Strand Siphon

name: Firepower

name: Heavy Handed

name: Special Ammo Scout

name: Heavy Ammo Scout
description: When one of your ammo finder perks creates a brick of Heavy ammo for you, it also creates bricks of Heavy ammo for your allies.

name: Font of Wisdom
description: You gain a bonus to intellect while you have any Armor Charge. Armor Charges decay over time.

name: Radiant Light

name: Powerful Friends
description: Collecting an Orb of Power causes nearby allies to increase their current Armor Charge by 1.

name: Focused Light

name: Release Recover
description: When you lose Flux of Darkness or Field of Light, begin recovering health.

name: Precise Jolts
description: Rapid precision hits with Arc weapons jolt the target. Must have an Arc subclass equipped.

name: Radiant Heat
description: Powerful combatant final blows with Solar weapons grants Radiant. Must have a Solar subclass equipped.

name: Volatile Volleys
description: Defeating powerful combatants with a Void weapon gives your Void weapons Volatile Rounds. Must have a Void subclass equipped.

name: Chill Out
description: Defeating a combatant with a Stasis weapon spawns a Stasis crystal. Must have a Stasis subclass equipped.

name: Tangled Up
description: Defeating a combatant with a Strand weapon spawns a Tangle. Must have a Strand subclass equipped.

description:
Adds a division computed appearance to your transmat effects.

This effect will change to reflect your current Competitive Division in Crucible.

name: Hadopelagic Tribute
description: Collecting Stasis shards gradually overflows the magazine.

name: Regenerative Motion

name: Static Buildup

name: Explosive Pact

name: Unsated Hunger
description:
Increased handling, reload speed, and stability when no abilities are fully charged.

Swords gain increased guard resistance and charge rate instead.

name: Disaster Plan
description:
Picking up ammunition increases this weapon's flinch resistance and range, which lasts until it is fired again.

Swords gain a large increase to charge rate instead.

name: Restoration Ritual
description: Reviving allies or defeating combatants with finishers reloads this weapon and readies an emergency ammo refill for the next time this weapon runs out of ammo.

name: Collective Action
description:
Collecting elemental pickups or throwing a Strand Tangle grants a stacking period of increased damage.

Elemental pickups include Firesprites, Void Breaches, Stasis Shards, Ionic Traces, and Strand Tangles.

name: Collective Action
description:
Collecting elemental pickups or throwing a Strand Tangle grants a longer initial period of increased damage, and an improved stacking period of increased damage.

Elemental pickups include Firesprites, Void Breaches, Stasis Shards, Ionic Traces, and Strand Tangles.

name: Discord
description: Final blows with another weapon grant this weapon increased speed for aiming down sights, accuracy, and airborne effectiveness for a short time. When Discord is active, final blows refund ammo.

description: Landing every shot in a burst grants this weapon increased damage and reduced charge time for an improved duration.
