name: Spark of Discipline
description: Spark of Discipline

name: Spark of Intellect
description: Spark of Intellect

name: Spark of Strength
description: Spark of Strength

name: Beyond Sight
description: Adds a beyond sight appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Animating Love
description: Adds an animating love appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Sugar Rush
description: Adds a sugar rush appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Highly Commendable
description: Adds a highly commendable appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Crystalline Breakout
description: Adds a crystalline breakout appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Property: Undecidable
description: Damage type matches your subclass.

name: Corrupted Nucleosynthesis
description: Enrages when dealing or sustaining damage.

name: Cursebringer
description: Precision final blows trigger an explosion.

name: Wild Card
description: Final blows with this weapon have a chance to create experimental submunitions at the target's location.

name: Nadir Focus
description: Sustained fire increases accuracy and range. Increases lunge distance for Swords, and projectile velocity for Launchers.

name: Head Rush
description: Standing up after crouching for a short time grants this weapon a brief period of improved handling and reload speed.

name: Cursed Thrall
description: After defeating a target with a melee attack, final blows with this weapon cause targets to explode for a short duration.

name: Heal Clip
description: Reloading shortly after dealing a final blow grants Cure to you and your nearby allies.

name: Heal Clip
description: Reloading after dealing a final blow grants Cure to you and your nearby allies. You have additional time to perform the reload.

name: Enlightened Action
description: Dealing damage improves reload speed and handling.

name: Enlightened Action
description: Dealing damage significantly improves reload speed and handling.

name: Precision Instrument
description: Dealing sustained damage increases precision damage.

name: Precision Instrument
description: Dealing sustained damage significantly increases precision damage.

name: High Ground
description: Gain bonus damage when attacking targets from higher ground.

name: High Ground
description: This weapon gains bonus damage when attacking targets from higher ground. Increases reload.

name: Barrel Constrictor
description: Final blows with this weapon reduce the projectile spread of its next shot for a short duration.

name: Barrel Constrictor
description: Final blows with this weapon significantly reduce the projectile spread of its next shot for an improved duration.

name: Sword Logic
description: Final blows with this weapon grant bonus damage. The strength and duration of the bonus increases when more powerful targets are defeated.

name: Sword Logic
description: Final blows with this weapon grant bonus damage for an improved duration. The strength and duration of the bonus increases when more powerful targets are defeated.

name: Loose Change
description: Applying an elemental debuff to a target increases this weapon's reload speed for a short duration.

name: Loose Change
description: Applying an elemental debuff to a target increases this weapon's reload speed for an improved duration.

name: Property: Irreducible
description: [Alternate Weapon Action] : Consume your grenade to load a large [projectile|shape|language] that generates an elemental explosion on impact.

name: Loyal Moths
description: Final blows with this weapon create a loyal moth. The moth will seek out nearby targets and detonate, damaging and blinding them.

name: Berserk Rush
description: Weapon enrages faster while amplified. Final blows with this weapon make you amplified.

name: Desperation
description: Reloading after a precision final blow or a final blow with a Cursed Thrall explosion increases your rate of fire and improves stability and aim assist.

name: Stochastic Vengeance
description: At 5 stacks of Markov Chain, [Alternate Weapon Action]  - switches between your melee attack and Monte Carlo's bayonet. Landing a bayonet melee hit grants melee energy.

name: Benevolent Overflow
description: While Engulfed in Light, dying or having the Chalice of Light taken from you creates a burst of healing around you. Multiple copies of this mod stack to increase the radius and potency of healing.

name: Refreshing Thirst
description: Becoming Drained of Light grants you an armor charge. Multiple copies of this mod stack to increase this benefit.

name: Stoic When Panicked
description: Gain damage resistance while you are standing on a plate, near a lantern or totem, or while you carry the relic Sword. Multiple copies of this mod stack to increase this benefit.

name: Brimming with Exhaustion
description: Reduce duration of the Drained of Light debuff by 2 seconds. Multiple copies of this mod stack to increase this benefit.

name: Chomping at the Stem
description: After you have been Drained of Light, gain a bonus to mobility, weapon handling, and reload speed. Multiple copies of this mod stack to increase this benefit.

name: Violent Pour
description: Weapon final blows against challenging combatants spawn an Orb of Power. Multiple copies of this mod stack to increase the potency of the Orb of Power.

name: Unstoppable Fusion
description:
Aiming down sights for a brief period with any Fusion Rifle you are wielding loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Fusion Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Arc/Strand Siphon Combo
description: Combines the Arc and Strand Siphon mods into one.

name: Solar/Strand Siphon Combo
description: Combines the Solar and Strand Siphon mods into one.

name: Void/Strand Siphon Combo
description: Combines the Void and Strand Siphon mods into one.

name: Origin Perk Specialization I
description: Greatly improves the benefits provided by the Head Rush, Nanotech Tracer Rockets, Unsated Hunger, and Cursed Thrall Origin Traits.

name: Diviner's Discount
description: All Scavenger mods are discounted.

name: Thanatotic Tangles
description: Strand weapon final blows have a chance to generate a Tangle.

name: Origin Perk Specialization II
description: Weapons with the Head Rush, Nanotech Tracer Rockets, Unsated Hunger, and Cursed Thrall Origin Traits are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Elemental Orbs: Void
description: While using a Void subclass, Void weapon final blows have a chance to spawn a Void Elemental Orb. Void Orbs can be thrown to create a Void explosion that makes enemies it damages volatile.

name: Elemental Orbs: Arc
description: While using an Arc subclass, Arc weapon final blows have a chance to spawn an Arc Elemental Orb. Arc Orbs can be thrown to create an Arc explosion that jolts targets it damages.

name: Elemental Orbs: Solar
description: While using a Solar subclass, Solar weapon final blows have a chance to spawn a Solar Elemental Orb. Solar Orbs can be thrown to create a Solar explosion that scorches targets it damages.

name: Overload Machine Guns
description:
Uninterrupted fire from your equipped Machine Gun stuns unshielded combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

name: Elemental Fury
description: While stunned, Champions take bonus damage from your abilities and Elemental Orb damage.

name: Communal Pickups
description: When an ally destroys or picks up your Tangle or Elemental Orb, the Tangle cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds and you gain bonus damage with weapons matching your subclass for 10 seconds.

name: Refreshing Pickups
description: Picking up a Tangle or Elemental Orb grants energy to your least-powered ability.

name: Semi-Auto Striker
description: If you have fewer than 2 stacks of Armor Charge, rapid precision shots with Bows, Snipers, and Scout Rifles generate an Armor Charge.

name: Monochromatic Maestro
description: Dealing elemental ability damage increases matching weapon damage, and elemental weapon damage increases matching ability damage. Bonus granted is 10% for 5 seconds.

name: Rapid-Fire Ranger
description: Rapid precision hits made from long range weaken the target.

name: Elemental Embrace
description: Subclass elemental buffs grant you bonus recovery and damage resistance against combatant attacks of the matching element type.

name: Elemental Munitions
description: Combatant final blows with Tangles or Elemental Orbs have a chance to drop Special or Heavy ammo.

name: Frenzied Stacks
description: Your Armor Charges grant bonus damage to your thrown Tangles or Elemental Orbs. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

name: Winged Eclipse
description: Loyal moths damage targets and aid your allies.

name: Relentless Tracker
description: Improves weapon damage after damaging a target with an ability.

name: Percussive Flames
description: Burning Maul and Consecration create flame cyclones.

name: One with the Void
description: Improves duration, damage, and durability of Void Souls.

name: Violent Reanimation
description: Multiple final blows with this weapon grant Devour to the wielder.

name: Splitvein Lineage
description: While Devour is active, this weapon weakens on hit.

name: Silkbound Slayer
description: This weapon deals bonus damage to suspended targets. Gain faster draw time for a short duration when you suspend a target from any source or damage a suspended target with this weapon.

name: Refined Soul
description: Grants bonus range and stability. Dealing a final blow or absorbing a Remnant grants additional increased weapon range, as well as increased mobility and handling for a short time.

name: Enduring Snare
description: Snareweaver traps last longer.

name: Multi-Threaded Snare
description: Snareweaver traps can suspend more targets.

name: High Octane
description: Igniting nearby targets partially replenishes fuel. This weapon refills itself from reserves upon gaining maximum fuel.

name: Pyromancer
description: This weapon replenishes its fuel faster. Defeating targets with this weapon causes them to periodically drop Firesprites.

name: Snareweaver
description: Create traps that suspend targets.

name: Hungering Quarrel
description: Double fires tracking bolts that leech health.

name: Composite Propellant
description: Rockets eject burning fuel.

name: Rocket-Assisted Frame
description: Sidearm fires self-propelled rocket ammunition. Projectiles explode on impact for high damage.

name: Sundering
description:
Destroying vehicles and constructs grants this weapon bonus reload speed and charge rate.

Constructs include barricades, turrets, Stasis crystals, and other objects created in the field.

name: Dragon's Vengeance
description: When an ally dies or you reach critical health, this weapon's magazine refills, and it gains bonus range, charge rate, and handling.

name: Advanced Reflexes
description: Upon taking damage from a target, quickly guard or aim down sights with this weapon to gain bonus mobility, handling, and charge rate for a short time.

name: Nano-Munitions
description: Being near allies slowly builds up a partial emergency ammo refill for the next time this weapon runs out of ammo. Emergency ammo amount increases with time spent near allies.

name: Slice
description: Casting your class ability allows this weapon to sever targets on hit for a brief duration, up to a maximum number of targets.

name: Attrition Orbs
description: Dealing sustained damage creates an Orb of Power.

name: Deconstruct
description:
Dealing sustained damage grants bonus damage against vehicles and constructs and partially refills the magazine from reserves. Damage with Primary ammo or against constructs provides additional progress.

Constructs include barricades, turrets, Stasis crystals, and other objects created in the field.

name: Beacon Rounds
description: Final blows with this weapon grant your projectiles tracking. Dealing further damage extends the duration.

name: Permeability
description: Using your class ability changes this weapon's damage type to match your subclass until you stow the weapon.

name: Slice
description: Casting your class ability allows this weapon to sever targets on hit for an improved duration, up to a maximum number of targets.

name: Attrition Orbs
description: Dealing sustained damage creates a slightly improved Orb of Power.

name: Deconstruct
description:
Dealing sustained damage grants bonus damage against vehicles and constructs for an improved duration and partially refills the magazine from reserves. Damage with Primary ammo or against constructs provides additional progress.

Constructs include barricades, turrets, Stasis crystals, and other objects created in the field.

name: Beacon Rounds
description: Final blows with this weapon grant your projectiles tracking for an improved duration. Dealing further damage extends the duration.

name: Permeability
description:
Using your class ability changes this weapon's damage type to match your subclass until you stow the weapon.
Improves handling.

name: Manifested Power
description: Adds a powerful appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Festive Entrance
description: Adds a festive appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Inflorescence
description: Adds an inflorescence appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Phosphene Stimulus
description: Adds a phosphene appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Anti-Barrier Sidearms
description: Your equipped Sidearms fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Additionally, Sidearms are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Unstoppable Hand Cannon
description: Your equipped Hand Cannons fire staggering rounds and stun [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Hand Cannons are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Unstoppable Bow
description: Holding a Bow fully drawn for a short time loads powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Bows are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Overload Auto Rifle
description: Sustained fire from Auto Rifles disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Auto Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Overload Pulse Rifle
description: Sustained fire from Pulse Rifles disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Pulse Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Flame, Fiber, and Freeze
description: Combines the Solar/Strand and Solar/Stasis Siphon mods into one.

name: Kindling Trigger
description: Radiant causes Solar weapons to apply scorch to unscorched combatants.

name: Blast Radius
description: Rapid final blows with Rocket Launchers and Grenade Launchers grant Armor Charge.

name: Origin Perk Specialization I
description:
Improves the benefits provided by the Sundering, Nano-Munitions, and Nanotech Tracer Rockets Origin Traits.

Additionally, weapons with these traits are always overcharged.

name: From Whence You Came
description: Increases ability damage to Taken and Scorn combatants.

name: Flint Striker
description: Rapid Solar weapon precision hits and rapid Solar weapon final blows grant Radiant.

name: Torch
description: While radiant, deal increased weapon damage to combatants affected by Strand and Stasis debuffs.

name: Heart of the Flame
description: Casting your Solar Super grants nearby allies radiant and increases the damage of your Super for each nearby ally.

name: Origin Perk Specialization II
description:
Improves the benefits provided by the Noble Deeds, Unsated Hunger, Head Rush, and Dragon's Vengeance Origin Traits.

Additionally, weapons with these traits are always overcharged.

name: Wished into Being
description:
While your Super is nearly fully-charged, ability final blows spawn Orbs of Power.  

Wearing Season of the Wish armor decreases Super amount threshold.

name: Unravelling Orbs
description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants Strand weapons Unraveling Rounds.

name: Pillar of Ice
description: Defeating an encased combatant spawns Stasis crystals.
Causing damage with a Solar ability weakens Champions and bosses for a short duration.

name: Overload Rocket Launchers
description: Rocket Launchers are especially affective against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

name: Dragon's Bite
description:
Breaking a combatant's shield with a Strand or Stasis weapon has a chance to suspend or freeze that combatant. 

Wearing Season of the Wish armor increases this chance.

name: Horde Shuttle
description: Damaging unraveled targets with a weapon occasionally spawns a threadling.

name: Hail The Storm
description:
Shattering encased targets and Stasis crystals deals increased damage.

Shattering Stasis crystals releases shards of ice that damage and slow targets.
Firing a Rocket Launcher consumes one stack of Armor Charge, granting increased damage and reload speed until you reload or stow your Rocket Launcher.

name: Spread the Wealth
description: Gain additional Glimmer when looting engrams.

name: Public Service
description: Increases public event rewards.

name: Venture Capital
description: Increases the chance of receiving reputation tokens when completing Nightfalls, Raids, and Trials.

name: Strength in Numbers
description: Increases chance of receiving an engram when completing playlist activities with a clan member.

name: Scavenger: Cabal
description: Improves rewards from eliminating Cabal enemies.

name: Vex Slayer
description: Improves rewards from eliminating Vex enemies.

name: Mercurial Luck
description: Chance to receive an additional Simulation Seed when one is collected on Mercury.

name: Crucible Hoarder
description: Chance to gain a second Crucible token whenever you receive one.

name: The Extra Mile
description: Completing a clan vendor challenge awards an additional 5 Legendary shards.

name: Explore the Infinite
description: Chance to receive a Legendary engram when completing Heroic adventures on Mercury with your clan members.

name: Crucible Cash
description: Gain bonus Glimmer when completing Crucible matches.

name: Hive Slayer
description: Improves rewards from eliminating Hive enemies.

name: Martian Publicity
description: Grants a chance for Heroic public events on Mars to reward an additional Mars token.

name: Vanguard Valiant
description: Grants a chance to receive an extra Vanguard token whenever you get one.

name: Hawthorne's Heroes
description: Grants a chance of receiving a Legendary engram when completing strikes with a clan member.

name: Union of Speed
description: Increased mobility when you're in a fireteam with clanmates.

name: Union of Recovery
description: Increased recovery when you're in a fireteam with clanmates.

name: Union of Strength
description: Increased resilience when you're in a fireteam with clanmates.

name: Anomalous Archaeologist
description: Grants a chance to receive additional Etheric and Baryon resources when collecting them in the Reef.

name: Bounteous
description: Grants a chance to receive an additional bounty when redeeming a clan bounty.

name: Refined Sights
description: The weekly clan challenge also grants an Enhancement Core.

name: Scorn Slayer
description: Grants additional rewards when you're defeating Scorn.

name: Small Offerings
description: Unlocks an additional weekly bounty for Hawthorne.

name: Catalyst Seeker
description: Increases the drop rate of Crucible and strike catalysts when playing with clanmates.

name: Core Hound
description: Completing a clan vendor challenge awards Enhancement Cores.

name: Minor Modifications
description: Completing a weekly Hawthorne bounty awards mod components.

name: All-Seeing Eye
description: Detect resources within a 30-meter range while on destinations with a linked obelisk.

name: Arms Production
description: Increase the progress rate toward Seraph weapon frames. Increases further when in a fireteam with clanmates.

name: Bountiful Unity
description: Earn bonus Trials reputation when winning Trials matches with clanmates.

name: True Sight
description: Opens your mind to the secrets of the Dreaming City.

name: Flickering Light
description: Increase XP gains by 2%.

name: Little Light
description: Increase XP gains by 3%.

name: Hopeful Light
description: Increase XP gains by 5%.

name: Burning Light
description: Increase XP gains by 8%.

name: Guiding Light
description: Increase XP gains by 10%.

name: Blinding Light
description: Increase XP gains by 12%.

name: Loot Seeker
description: Detects caches within a 20-meter range.

name: Prize Pursuant
description: Detects caches within a 30-meter range.

name: Cache Finder
description: Detects caches within a 40-meter range.

name: Treasure Hunter
description: Detects caches within a 50-meter range.

name: Expert Tracker
description: Detects caches within a 75-meter range.

name: Destabilized Resource Detector
description: Detect resources within a 20-meter range.

name: Makeshift Resource Detector
description: Detect resources within a 30-meter range.

name: Stable Resource Detector
description: Detect resources within a 40-meter range.

name: Enhanced Resource Detector
description: Detect resources within a 50-meter range.

name: Perfected Resource Detector
description: Detect resources within a 75-meter range.

name: Combo Detector
description: Detect caches or resources within a 40-meter range.

name: Wombo Detector
description: Detect caches or resources within a 50-meter range.

name: Meager Glimmer Booster
description: Increases Glimmer gains by 5%.

name: Standard Glimmer Booster
description: Increases Glimmer gains by 10%.

name: Considerable Glimmer Booster
description: Increases Glimmer gains by 20%.

name: Prodigious Glimmer Booster
description: Increases Glimmer gains by 35%.

name: Supercharged Glimmer Booster
description: Increases Glimmer gains by 50%.

name: Ultimate Glimmer Booster
description: Increases Glimmer gains by 65%.

name: Bountiful Harvest
description: Chance to obtain additional Glimmer when harvesting.

name: Public Defender
description: Increased loot from public events on all destinations.

name: Arc Analyzer
description: Generate gunsmith telemetry data on Arc weapon final blows.

name: Solar Analyzer
description: Generate gunsmith telemetry data on Solar weapon final blows.

name: Void Analyzer
description: Generate gunsmith telemetry data on Void weapon final blows.

name: Omni-Telemetry
description: Generate gunsmith telemetry data on any elemental weapon final blow.

name: Banshee Special
description: Generate gunsmith telemetry data on any elemental weapon final blow at an increased rate.

name: Discipline Armorer
description: Armor pieces with random stats you acquire will have a guaranteed minimum of 10 Discipline, and are more likely to drop with higher Discipline.

name: Intellect Armorer
description: Armor pieces with random stats you acquire will have a guaranteed minimum of 10 Intellect, and are more likely to drop with higher Intellect.

name: Strength Armorer
description: Armor pieces with random stats you acquire will have a guaranteed minimum of 10 Strength, and are more likely to drop with higher Strength.

name: Mobility Armorer
description: Armor pieces with random stats you acquire will have a guaranteed minimum of 10 Mobility, and are more likely to drop with higher Mobility.

name: Recovery Armorer
description: Armor pieces with random stats you acquire will have a guaranteed minimum of 10 Recovery, and are more likely to drop with higher Recovery.

name: Resilience Armorer
description: Armor pieces with random stats you acquire will have a guaranteed minimum of 10 Resilience, and are more likely to drop with higher Resilience.

name: Lesser Core Harvest (Crucible)
description: Precision final blows in Crucible have a chance to award an Enhancement Core.

name: Greater Core Harvest (Crucible)
description: Precision final blows in Crucible have a chance to award an Enhancement Prism.

name: Lesser Core Harvest (Gambit)
description: Defeating invaders in Gambit has a chance to award an Enhancement Core.

name: Greater Core Harvest (Gambit)
description: Defeating invaders in Gambit has a chance to award an Enhancement Prism.

name: Lesser Core Harvest (Vanguard)
description: Defeating bosses in Vanguard playlist strikes or Nightfalls has a chance to award an Enhancement Core.

name: Greater Core Harvest (Vanguard)
description: Defeating bosses in Vanguard playlist strikes or Nightfalls has a chance to award an Enhancement Prism.

name: Core Harvest
description: Earn bonus Enhancement Cores when completing ritual activities.

name: Prism Harvest
description: Earn bonus Enhancement Prisms when completing ritual activities.

name: Modularity (Crucible)
description: Crucible wins have a chance to award an Upgrade Module.

name: Modularity (Gambit)
description: Gambit wins have a chance to award an Upgrade Module.

name: Modularity (Vanguard)
description: Vanguard playlist strikes and Nightfall completions have a chance to award an Upgrade Module.

name: Modularity
description: Achieving victory in ritual activities grants a chance to award an Upgrade Module.

name: Materialism (Crucible)
description: Crucible wins have a chance to award destination materials.

name: Materialism (Vanguard)
description: Vanguard playlist strikes and Nightfall completions have a chance to award extra destination materials.

name: Materialism (Gambit)
description: Gambit wins have a chance to award destination materials.

name: Prosperity (Crucible)
description: Crucible wins have a chance to drop an additional piece of Legendary gear.

name: Prosperity (Vanguard)
description: Vanguard playlist strikes and Nightfall completions have a chance to drop an additional piece of Legendary gear.

name: Prosperity (Gambit)
description: Gambit wins have a chance to drop an additional piece of Legendary gear.

name: Prosperity
description: Achieving victory in ritual activities grants a chance to drop an additional piece of Legendary gear.
